price: 9. Tohih lakal diggah, anu xongolo fayya keenih heeh, tutuccah tutuccu keenit exce.
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنِّيٓ أَعۡلَنتُ لَهُمۡ وَأَسۡرَرۡتُ لَهُمۡ إِسۡرَارٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma innī aʿlantu lahum wa-asrartu lahum is'rāran
